{{GeniusInvokationTCGTabs}}

Genius Invokation TCG is a trading card game originating from [[Sumeru]]. It was invented by researchers at [[Sumeru Akademiya]],<ref>{{Ref/Quest|King of Invokations}}</ref> who commissioned [[Liben]] to bring the TCG to [[Yae Publishing House]] in [[Inazuma]].<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Liben|condition=during [[Marvelous Merchandise/2021-12-27]]}}</ref> Since then, the TCG has become popular across Inazuma and Sumeru. [[Puspa Café]] in [[Sumeru City]] is a common spot for players of the TCG to play.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Nayab}}</ref>

Dragon-themed decks exist in the TCG.<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/HHm6QptfeYU?t=275 Collected Miscellany - "Cyno: Path of the Lone Wolf"]</ref>
